messages.title: A better deal for Bath
messages.content: I've never been afraid to stand up for my community or take on powerful people. I'm known for getting things done.

messages.title: Schools: Why won't the Government listen?
messages.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Bath. Conservative cuts to our schools mean fewer teachers and bigger classes.

messages.title: NHS: At breaking point
messages.content: Conservative cuts have left our NHS in dire trouble. Waiting lists are longer, operations cancelled, & A&E under pressure as never before. Liberal Democrats are clear that our national healthcare system must provide high quality care to all â€“ across both mental and physical health.

messages.title: BREXIT: Who will speak up for you?
messages.content: The Conservatives WON'T and Labour CAN'T. Back the Liberal Democrats to give our area the voice it needs to oppose this Tory Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives have bad plans for our NHS and schools
For increased funding for the NHS & schools, fighting for a better deal for Bath

issues.brexitEurope: Challenging the damaging Hard Brexit. Only the Lib Dems have the courage to stand against the Tories. Labour's collapse means we are the only party fighting hard Brexit.
issues.education: Conservative cuts to our schools mean fewer teachers and bigger classes.
issues.health: Conservative cuts have left our NHS in dire trouble. Waiting lists are longer, operations cancelled, & A&E under pressure as never before.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm a teacher and successful in the real world outside politics. I have been pretty successful in the careers including being a teacher and a journalist, and I'm also the mother of four children aged 20 to 27.
